segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, everything seems ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is polishing dishes, her back to the rest of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spilling over the sink edge, soaking the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear it or feel the wet under her foot?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are raiding the cookie jar without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool the boy is on is tilting dangerously backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll crash down with cookies flying everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just egging him on, reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage alone will be a nightmare to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor cabinets are getting ruined right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
